Description: This is an Electra guitar from the late 70s and early 80s. I was able to sand the body and neck down to the natural wood color. It’s original color was a walnut. It has DiMarzio Style pickups that work as they should. There is a phase switch that allows for a single coil sound. One volume and two tone controls. I originally wanted to stain it the original color. It can be made to be new like. Guitar is made thinner and lighter than the Les Paul models and has its own style. The original case is included and is very good condition. Paypal preferred. Returns made within five days. Please notify seller with any concerns. Will require signature for delivery. And will be insured for full value. Buyer to pay for returns. In addition to the above I was able to stain one coat. Hoping this does not impede selling. Will be add photo to case. Very good condition.
Title: Electra electric guitar
ConditionDescription: This is an Electra guitar in wanted to refinish, but due to other obligations my time is limited. Guitar has been sanded down ready to either varnish or stain. There are no scrapes.a simple stain or polish can bring out the zebra wood used in this guitar. The pick ups are humbucking DiMarzios. The action is very low. Guitar is lite. The strap holders are missing. Comes with original case that is lined with velvet. Guitar can be made to look new in the right hands.
